author: kdy1
message:
build: Update `swc_core` to `v16.4.0` (#76596)

### What?

ChangeLog:
https://github.com/swc-project/swc/compare/swc_core%40v16.0.0...swc_core%40v16.4.0

### Why?

To apply https://github.com/swc-project/swc/pull/10119 and fix random panics.

---------

Co-authored-by: CPunisher <1343316114@qq.com>
